statements: DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE country = 'USA' AND emission_category = 'CO2';
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE country = 'Canada' AND emission_category = 'CO2' AND emission_value > 100;
DELETE FROM EmissionsData WHERE plant_id = 1 AND emission_type = 'CO2';
DELETE FROM Plants WHERE plant_location = 'California' AND plant_owner = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM EmissionsData WHERE plant_id = 1 AND emission_type = 'CO2';
DELETE FROM Plants WHERE plant_location = 'New York' AND plant_owner = 'XYZ Corp';
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1 AND emission_type = 'CO2';
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1 AND measured_date < '2022-01-01';
